description: bust length portrait of a bearded man left profile facing foreward; holding a small ball in right hand; wearing flat brimmed hat, with fur collar on cloak; an oval composition with an elaborate square frame around oval; figures of soldiers in armor on sides, ram's head at bottom and a face above; on verso portrait of man, half length facing left, looking back right; wearing armor, holding a bar in right hand; oval composition with elaborate square frame
inscription:
Inscription

on mount in pencil: T. Stimmer / 2-435
title: Print
